name: GodWarriors
description:
In GodWarriors, you are a legendary warrior serving one of the 4 mightiest Gods of Olympus. Who amongst Athena, Hades, Poseidon or Zeus will you follow and help conquering the world?

In the game, players fight not only in exciting 1vs1 tactical duels but also for the domination of this ancient world, joining battles that involve gods, monsters and legendary heroes!

GodWarriors is a true MMORPG with an original background mixing japanase shônen influence and greek mythology where you are the only master of your own destiny. Join us on this adventure!

Please note that this project was originally released in 2003; It's a slow-paced game with a strong focus on roleplay, and the target audience is definitely old-school RPG fan :)
